alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:12PM MST until March 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with locally higher amounts up to 5 inches possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph could produce areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Utah Valley and Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected during the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Allow extra time to reach your destination or consider alternate travel plans. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley
